summary: AS I WAS DRIVING ON I-85 N.  THE LEFT REAR TREAD OF THE TIRES CAME OFF, CAUSING ME TO LOSE CONTROL OF MY VEHICLE.  THE TOYOTA 4 RUNNER WAS DESTROYED I WAS VERY FORTUNATE.  I ROTATED AND BALANCED MY TIRES ON A REGULAR BASIS.  THE WEATHER WAS CLEAR, AND DRY.   THESE TIRES NEED TO BE THOROUGHLY INVESTIGATED. *AK( DOT NUMBER:   TIRE SIZE: 195R15 )

ROLLOVER ON FLAT, DRY PAVEMENT, 50 MPH, "FISH HOOK" MANEUVER TO AVOID OTHER VEHICLE, AS PER 1986 POLICE REPORT.  IS THERE SOMEONE I SHOULD CONTACT? PAID 4 YEARS ON BANK LOAN FOR A DESTROYED VEHICLE, BROKE NECK/HALO TRACTION/FUSION OF 3 VERTEBRAE.
